Title: LARGE FACE CUFF GENEVA QUARTZ WATCH BANGLE CHUNKY STYLE HEART ❤️ DETAIL
Description: Quartz Geneva polished stainless silver tone cuff bangle Watch I bought this in America originally, it cost me $50 I've worn it on a few occasions & then it's been stored in my drawer. It needs a new battery. It has a second hand and nice quirky heart in the centre Can't see any scratches in the face, there are a few marks on the inside of it but that's just part f it and we're present at purchase. The cuff has some minor surface scratches purely from rubbing on my bangles when I've worn it I think. But nothing that detracts from it. A great size & quirky watch that you won't see everyone wearing. I am having to sell off all my collections due to moving overseas I am not a business so regrettably I don't accept returns. These are all my own personal collection collected over the years and am sad to sell it I have loads of other goodies for sale so please take a look. Thank you 😀 As I am moving overseas I need to get rid of loads of stuff and these are on the hit list!
